title: Check on Title Commitment
description: The TC needs to ensure the title commitment has been issued and reviewed by the deadline.

tasks.description: Check the transaction timeline for the title review deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the deadline is this Friday.

tasks.description: Contact the title company to get the status of the title commitment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent learns from the title company that the commitment has been issued and was sent yesterday.

tasks.description: Confirm the buyer's agent has received and reviewed the title commitment and that there are no issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: The buyer's agent confirms they have reviewed the commitment and have no objections.
